comment_body: I have built sonic with pins, but I find that genl_packet kernel module not installed. Where I can find these codes to build?

> I have built sonic with pins, but I find that genl_packet kernel module not installed. Where I can find these codes to build?

I have upload some initial code, for availability but it is still incomplete.  it will build and work but the debian packaging still needs some work - the kernel module code will build from the directory but you need to ensure you have the correct kernel headers
